data.title: Tuition & Fees, Net Price
data.meta_description: The 2023-2024 Tuition of Whitworth University is $50,920 for undergraduate programs and $12,924 for graduate programs.
data.text:
The 2024 tuition & fees of Whitworth University is $50,920 for first-year students and the 2024 graduate school tuition & fees is $12,924. Its undergraduate tuition & fees is much higher than the average amount for similar schools' tuition of $33,035.

94% of enrolled undergraduate students have received grants or scholarships and the average aid amount is $34,208. It could cover 67.18% of full tuition amount.

After receiving the financial aid, the net price (COA) is $35,005 including tuition, fees, books & supplies costs, and living costs.

Whitworth's 4-year tuition is $215,626, based on current tuition and change rate. The estimated 4-year COA including living costs and personal expenses is $293,072.

Whitworth Tuition Trends

Whitworth Financial Aid

Washington Tuition

Undergraduate Program Tuition & Fees

For the academic year 2023-2024, the undergraduate tuition & fees at Whitworth University is $50,920. The 2024 undergraduate tuition has been risen by 3.94% compared to the previous year. Its undergraduate tuition & fees is much higher than the average amount for similar schools' tuition of $33,035.

The 2025 estimated undergraduate tuition & fees is $52,926 , a 3.9% increase compared to 2024's rate.

Graduate Program Tuition & Fees

For graduate programs, 2024 tuition & fees is $12,924. The graduate tuition has been risen by 0.84% compared to the previous year. Its graduate tuition & fees is lower than the average amount for similar schools' tuition of $16,240.

The estimated graduate school tuition & fees is $13,033 for the academic year 2024-2025 , a 0.8% increase compared to 2024's rate.

Cost Per Credit Hour

The below table describes the cost per credit hour for part-time students and/or full-time students who take additional courses more than regular credit hours at Whitworth.

The undergraduate cost per credit hour is $2,064. The graduate tuition per credit hour is $718.

Cost of Attendance with Living Costs and Books & Supplies

The living costs including for room, board, transpiration, and other personal expenses is $17,525 for year 2024. The on-campus living costs increased by 5.40% compared to the previous year. The off-campus living costs increased by 0.76% compared to the previous year.

The Whitworth's 2024 on-campus COA is $69,213 and off-campus COA is $72,172.
